TEXT.S:
Canadatatangahan:u siwkay nu kanatal u Canada sa ilabu nu kaamisan a Amilikaan, itiza i 45 00 N, 75 00 W, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 9,984,670 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 9,093,507 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 891,163 km2, hamin nu tademawan sa 35,362,905.
kakalukan umah sa 6.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 34.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 59.10%.
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Ottawa.
sapadateng nu kanatal demiadsapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 7 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Elizabeth II, micakat a demiad sa i 1952 a mihca 2 bulad 6 demiad. u kulit nu hata nu Canda kanatal sa, situsa ku kulit, u sumanahay atu salengacay. i telung sa u papah nu kilang. uyniyan a kanatal, sienaw i kasienawan, yadah ku suledah i buyubuyuan.
u hatau kulit nu hata nu kanatal sa, situsa a kulit. u sumanahay atu sangelacay.
u sulit nu zuma a kamuu sulit nu Hulam: u sulit nu Lipun: u sulit nu Amilika: CanadaCanadakamu nu United Kingdom, kamu nu France, Canada, IPA u kaku sa/'kænədə/ing a kamu/kanada/ba'a kamu"i kaamisan a Amilikaan (Pey-miy-zuwa kanatal, nutipan i sasa nu waliyu, nuwalian a katukuh i saetipyu, nuamisan a kuli a bayu katukuh i Ba-bing-yang, nuwalian nuwamisanay atu Denmarka lalaan mapapauwan tu Greenland, nuwamisan atu Sen-pi-yemapapauwan tu Mi-ke-lung-yung-daw, tunulan atu satipan atu A-mi-li-kamatatulas ku lala', Canadaa ku ahebal nu lala', pakala tu 998 a bang 4,670 km2, mahamin i kitakit ku a hebal sakatusa nu tabakiay a kanatal, satu u macakatay a kanatalan, u satabakiay nu hekal a lala'. singanga tu a kanatal han. (u sulit nu hulam: Canada:CanadaIPA:/'kænədə//kanada/) uyni u macakatay a kanatalan a hebal ku lala', uynian a kanatal kahenulan a tuse u Ottawa, kahenulan a tuse u Vancouver (Wen-ke-hua ), Toronto (Du-lun-du ) atu Montreal (Men-te-lou ), hamin u kanatal cacay a bataan a kenis atu nisapulungan tu tuluay a kakitizaan, Canadamapasilut nu Bu-bi-se shìi 2020 a mihcaan miales mabulaw nueneng singangan tunian a kanatal. (u sulit nu hulam: 99846702020) Canadai ayaw nu 1,400 a mihcaan izaw tu ku yuancumin mauzip, kasumamadan tu sazikuzan tu 15 a mihcaan, United Kingdom atu France micumutay a tademawan malingatu tu amisuninip tu nuwamisan a Amilikana nuwalian a tukus satu i tini patizeng tu micunutay a tademaw, 1763 a mihcaan , yu pituay a mihcaan namalepun ku ngangayaw hawsa France mapacici' tu mahamin tu ku nuwamisan a Amilikana micunutay makelap pabeli tu United Kingdom). kilul satu tu pinaay a cacay bataan a mihcaan, United Kingdom nu mitebungay a tademaw pasaysatipan amin suninip tu tay-ping -yang a kakitizaan patizeng satu pinaay tu baluhay nu micumutay a tademaw, 1867 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 1 a demiad, 1867 a mihcaan maawas tu ku nipahulican a hulic, Canadaa kenis maletak u An-da-luyatu Kuy-be-kea kenis, atu baluhay Bu-lan-zi-wiyatu Sin-se-ke-si-ystulu ku United Kingdom tungusay a nuwamisan a Amilikanmicunutay misakaput tu Canada a malapulungan a kanatal, kilul tu pinaay a mihcaan, u zuma tu pinaay tu a lala'an, United Kingdom tungusay a nuwamisan a Amilikannu micunutay tahekalay tunuan a lala', lalit amicumut tu malapulungan a kanatal, misakaput tu ayzaay a ziday, nu Canada, 1931 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 11 a demiad, United Kingdom maawas tu Si-mina saculcul a hulic, u Canadamala u masatekeday a kanatal, nika u mikelitay nu kanatal mahizatu u nitauyaay a nu United Kingdom Hung-tiay a kanatal ci Ciaw-ce-uw-se, u United Kingdom a Kuw-heymahizatu ami emec tu Canadani kayzuan a hulic. (u sulit nu hulam: 1400151763186771186710019311211193319491982417)
laylayi kasumamadan nu Yuan-cu-minduduc tuni uni micekuway tu susumamaday hehay atu tuud u mi su subelidan tu nipasubanaan pinanaman, sayadah i 24,500 a mihcaan ayaw nayay i tini nuwamisan izaw tu ku tademawan a mi kawaw, i tiniay i tumulay An-da-luea tademaw mikawaway a tademaw, tateng a mikilim i tiza i ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 7,500 a mihcaan, Ciw-ke-luo-pin-timasaenalay a enal, atu Lan-uy-dung-sieybuhang nisubelidan i kasasumamadan tu ni kauzip nuheni i lalabu nu kanatal a Canadau kasumamadan u sabalakiay a tademawan i tiza nueneng, siykay nu Yuan-cu-min u mizidekay a kakitizaan pasu matenesay nuenengay u kaluk kukawaw paluma'malalemelay u masaeletayu hini u satalakaw atu pacakayay a Wang-lu, nu zuma a yincumin kacakat nu siy-kay i Europenu micumuday a tademaw katukuh i ayaw nu Canadamaliwasak tu imahini pakaawas dada' tu kutkutan tu nu kasumamadan a tuud micekiw tuyzaan u nu makapatay a siy-kay. (u sulit nu hulam: 24,5007,500) i laylayan nau United Kingdom atu France kumicumudaay yunian a lala' Canadaa lalangawan namalilit nu tusaay a kanatal atu yincumin a lalangawan tu nu kasumamadan nu babalaki a nikauzip, unian u kamu nu yincumin n nalimaan atu dadiw mahizatu malilit nu Canadaa tademawan ktuud ku Canadaaya tademaw , sadi'men miazih tu yadahay a lalangawan, maazih ku yadahay a lalangawan uynian akanatal saan. (u sulit nu hulam: ) Canadaa kanatal mahiza malilit nu tahak, laylay malilit nu lalay atu yincumin i mahiza u alingulnu kanatalay mahiza tu nu laylay mitalaayaw tu kasumamadan tu 18 a mihcaan, matudung makulit ku alinguli ayaw atu ayzaay hata nu Canada, cacay a kalibuwa atu I kanatalay atu Canada-ku-huyipabaw, nu zumaay a kanatal mahiza izaw henay u He-li, Canada ngaciwPu-tung-cang-niawatu Hung-ya-cia-na-ta-ciy-cing. (u sulit nu hulam: 18)
i kasumamadan picumutan tukasumamadan tu 1,000 a mihcaanay tu, Europe (O-cuo ) a tademaw saayaway a mipaemek tu nian a Canada, sumanahay a ngisngis ci Ay-zuy-kenai Niw-ben-lan-dawa subal Lan-say- aw-ce-mu-caw-dipatizeng pacena' nuengen i tiza namakay Pay-onu micumutay hawsa, Canadaketenes tu demiad caay tu katadebin atu Europe (O-cuw ), katukuh 1497 a mihcaan Italya tademaw ci Caw-wa-ni-ka-bu-tu (·)John Cabotnu Englandnu misuninipay nu Canadai saetipyua bayuan, i kasumamadan tu 16 a mihcaan, Pa-se-ceatu Portugali bayuay a tademaw i saetipyua tukus patizang tu nu puu'ay miala tu cingatu mibuting i tiza, 1534 a mihcaan Francenu miteswkay tu bayu a tademaw ci Ya-ce-ka-di-ya(·) (Jacques Cartier) misumimip i Sen-lu-lun-se-wan, atu i 7 bulad 24 a demiad tu Franceci Fa-lan-suo-wa-i'-sea ngangan tuyza a lala' miala tuyza a lala'an. (u sulit nu hulam: 1000 1497·John Cabot161534·Jacques Cartier724)
kasumamadan tu 20 a mihcaan(20) kasumamadan tu 20 a mihcaan, u misakakuay mikuwanay nu Canadamakelap nu United Kingdomtunu zumaay a kawaw sisa United Kingdomtuni a ngangayaw pakaynian tu ngangayaw hawsa Canadamilihiza tu ngangayaw mapaculcul pasayza i satipan a ngangayawan nu Canadamilihizaay a hitay a misakaput mala u tabakiay a salaput a hitay nu kalahitayay a Canaduynian a hitay i Wy-mi-ling-can-iya ngangayaw au nu zumaay kulahenulan a ngangayawan u mala u sakahenulan a tademaw, milihiza tunian a ngangayaw 650,000 ku tademaw, u nu Canadaaya tademaw, pakala tu 173,000 a mapatayay a tademaw 173,000 madukaay a tademaw. (u sulit nu hulam: 20)
u hekal nu lala'Canadamaala tu ku nuwamisanay mahamin nu kakatizaan nu Pa-mi-cuw, nu zumaay a lala' makaysatipan nu waliyua kakitizaan, lalid katukuh i nusawalian nu saetipyua kakitizaan, nuwamisan nayad katukuh i nuwamisan u sikuliay a bayu, u nian Greenlanda kanatal u nu sawalian satipan, Sen-pi-ye-yu-mi-ke-lung-sung-dawi nu tinulan Newfoundlandu pulung nu ahebal nu lala', pasu i hekalay a lala'atu nanumay a lala'Canadahamin a kanatal sakatusa tabakiay a kanatal dada' I Russiau nian dada' i hekalay a lala' u piasip tu a hebal ciniza mahamin i kitakit, u sakasepat nu satabakiay namakay, (u sulit nu hulam: ;) 1925 a mihcaan malingatu tu Canadatu kamu satipan 60 du katukuh 141du nu bay-ci a kakitizaan tu uynian a lala' nika mahiza caay kakatuud ku palatatenga'ay, ciniza i kitakitan u saamisay nuenengay nu tademawan, u hitay i Ay-lel-se-mi-lel-dawsubalan tu Canada-cung-tuy-cing-paw-cang. (u sulit nu hulam: 192560141)
cen-ce cenhu Canadaa zen-ze a nikuwan u hung-ti ku mipahulicay tu I-huy-ce, u nian ku San-cun-ban-li, tu ni situngusay Li-ba-cuan, Se-ba-cuanatu Sin-zen-cuanmakayni I hung-ti nu Ca-na-da-cun-kuku pahulicay ayzaay a hung-ti,u tatayna a hung-ti ci I'-li-sa-bay-e'-se, cinza mahizatu nu zumaay sabaw limaay u masatekeday tu Da-in-ku-siya kanatal a hung-ti. (u sulit nu hulam: [87][88][89]15)
kalisiway uynian a kanatal u Canadaa gingku uynian a kanatal tu Cung-yana gingku, ci Se-di-ben-pu-luo-ce(·) ku mikuwanay u kalisiw nu tapang atu nu kuziay a tapang, u Canadau nisulitan sapasilut tu ni lekakawa u zaysan nu Canada(u sulit nu hulam: ·)
tademaw kilul tunisalitan 2016 a mihcaan tu nipikingsa tu tademaw, Canadanu nuenengay a tademaw pulung izaw ku 35,151,728, palecad tu 2011 a mihcaan macunus tu pakalal tu 5.0%, i 1871 a mihcaan Canadaa saayaway ku piking sat u tademaw macunus tu 10 u kacakat. (u sulit nu hulam: 201635,151,72820115.0%187110)
kamu kilul tu nusulitan Canada a tademaw misakaku atu misatekeday a hulic, sakasabaw tulua ceding,atu nukanatak a hulic,atu nu Canadaa kamu anipahulic Canadaa kamu u (u sulit nu hulam: )
lalangawan Canadaa kanatal u sayadahay a binacadan a tademaw, u lalangawan paka pabinacadan malilit tu yadah tu masazumaay a lalangawan, kayadah nu lalangawan maading nu ni pahulican i Quebec (Kuy-bay-ce-seng ) Quebec a tademawan, matineng au zanan a tademawan a saan.[1] (u sulit nu hulam: [206])
